sourcesContent: {/* Product Image */} {/* Details */} {item.product?.name || item.name} {/* Show Customizations */} {item.selectedSize && ( Size: {item.selectedSize.name} )} {item.selectedShape && ( Shape: {item.selectedShape.name} )} {item.selectedFlavor && ( Flavor: {item.selectedFlavor.name} )} {/* Toppings (Array) */} {item.selectedToppings?.length > 0 && ( Toppings: {item.selectedToppings.map(t => t.name).join(", ")} )} Quantity: {item.quantity} Price: â‚¹{item.totalPrice ?? item.basePrice * item.quantity}
